titleStmt.title: A rule for ministers and people, whereby they may see how they are engaged one towards another, by Gods word. And (as in a glass) herein may be seen when any fail, and when one or both are faithful. By N.C. a servant of Christ, and of his church assembled at Orpington in Kent.
titleStmt.author: N. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the black Spread-Eagle neer the west-end of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
